oai_dc:dc.dc:title: C and M Grocery Store in Edgehill, 1965
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Photograph of C and M Grocery Store in Edgehill, located at the corner of 10th Avenue South and Woods Street, 26 August 1965. A woman and child are visible in front of the store. The area was part of the Edgehill Urban Renewal Project area (Project Tenn. R-69). Photographed by Bill Driver of the Nashville Housing Authority. Forms part of the MDHA Photograph Collection. 1 photograph : b & w.
